content: The following steps should show email headers: (Inside the email) tap three vertical dots on the top right corner > tap "Show headers".
creator: Yu5tiqX9og

content:
That only shows the headers, not the text of the msg When fishing spam arrives with links you can't see where that link would take you. What would be nice is to be able to review the complete message and even optionally save to a text file... Thanks for the reply though :)

content:
可能なら下記の要件の機能追加を検討していただきたいです。

スパムや詐欺メール報告を各国の行政機関や団体に簡単に報告できるように報告ボタンで連動してメールヘッダや報告先を個別登録したメールアドレスに簡単に送信できるようにできればありがたいです。

現状のやり方は以下のステップが必要で手間がかかっています。

1.スパム、詐欺メール受信をしたら、ヘッダ情報を表示してコピー 2.報告先の機関のメールアドレスを指定 3.本文にコピーしたヘッダ情報を貼り付ける 4.メール送信 5.受信メールからスパム、詐欺メールを詐欺メールフォルダに移動 6.送信済みメールフォルダから報告メールを移動 7.年単位や月単位でスパム、詐欺メールのフォルダ内を削除
creator: tsuchiyatoshihiro

content:
Hi,

The people who answer questions here, for the most part, are other users volunteering their time (like me), not Mozilla employees or developers.

I can see that you have asked a support question and will do my best to look at that next.
creator: plwt

content: I know that, but there seems to be no way whatsoever to get to Mozilla Support, if it exists. All links to "Mozilla Support" in a Google search bring me back here, hence my question how to contact actual Mozilla Support. Sorry - it won't let me mark your reply as Helpful! And now it does
creator: Tombarkas

content:
This community support forum is Mozilla support as there is no form of direct chat or ticket system for free to use products like the Firefox web browsers, the Thunderbird email clients.

However Mozilla does have direct ticket support here for their subscription based products as in Mozilla VPN, MDN Plus and the Plus/Premium versions of Firefox Relay, Pocket, Mozilla Monitor because you well paid for it as part of subscription.
creator: James

content: Thanks - that saves me wasting more time looking. So, if noone replies, you're screwed. Thunderbird for PC has never been a problem, as I've always had support, especially from one very helpful individual (can't remember name). One reason for posting was in case it was a design fault.
creator: Tombarkas

content: We're working on getting more responses to android issues. Perhaps you could also help? https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/thunderbird-android is a good starting point.
creator: wsmwk

content: In fact, there is an event coming up where anyone can particpate.
creator: wsmwk

content: You question is not on topic in this forum. So I will move it to the android forum and lock it as a duplicate. I do not use or support Andriod. That is why I never look in that forum.
creator: MattAuSupport

content: I forgot to add that I installed non beta version 9 and send works.
